name: TI_2_1_3_10_Maintenance_Completed_System_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.3.10 Maintenance Completed System Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track maintenance completed event.
purpose: Capture maintenance completed event, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.10#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when maintenance is completed, including restart from down time.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.10#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.10#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.10#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.10#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.10#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.10#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
